name: GRBV
description:
Game mechanic concept that seemed more fun in my head but I thought it suited a traditional arcadey shooter of sorts. For the Awesome-Per-Second theme I figured, why not just forget all of that waves-of-enemies filler nonsense and just have a boss fight!?

Instructions -

  • Move with WASD or Arrows
  • Aim with the Mouse
  • Hold down Left or Right mouse click to charge up and fire a bLue or oRange vortex (respectively)
  • Destroy one colour vortex by firing the other colour at it
  • Only bLue or oRange bullets can damage the HP tanks of their corresponding colour
  • Any colour bullet can damage the white HP tanks
  • Destroy all the boss' HP tanks in both of its forms to win!

The game is fairly unfinished and I spent way too long on my coder art but hopefully someone enjoys playing it for a few minutes.

First ever game jam submission... Made for "The Very First Extra Credits Game Design Jam!"
